TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ListBindingHelper extends System.Object
public ref class ListBindingHelper abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供用于发现可绑定列表的功能，当该列表中包含的项的属性与这些项要绑定到的对象的公共属性不同时，还提供相应的功能用于发现这些项的属性。

span.span: Provides functionality to discover a bindable list and the properties of the items contained in the list when they differ from the public properties of the object to which they bind.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类使用由类，如。This class is used by classes such as . 请注意，对于智能手机应用程序，此类需要 Windows 移动版本 5.0 软件智能手机。Note that for Smartphone applications, this class requires Windows Mobile Version 5.0 software for Smartphones.

summary.span: 返回与数据源相关联的列表。

span.span: Returns a list associated with a data source.

Public Shared Function GetList (list As Object) As Object
public: static System::Object ^ GetList(System::Object ^ list);

param.name: list
param.span: 要检查其基础列表的数据源。

span.span: The data source to examine for its underlying list.

summary.span: 返回与指定数据源相关联的列表。

span.span: Returns a list associated with the specified data source.

returns.span: 如果基础列表存在，则为表示基础列表的 ；否则为由 指定的原始数据源。

span.span: An representing the underlying list if it exists; otherwise, the original data source specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果数据源指定`list`参数实现接口，则方法将返回类型的对象表示相关联的列表。If the data source specified by the `list` parameter implements the interface, then the method will return an object of type that represents the associated list. 否则，此方法只需将返回指定的数据源，因为没有基础列表。Otherwise, this method will just return the specified data source since there is no underlying list.

summary.span: 通过对指定数据源和可选数据成员进行求值来返回一个对象（通常为列表）。

span.span: Returns an object, typically a list, from the evaluation of a specified data source and optional data member.

returns.span: 如果已找到基础列表，则为表示该基础列表的 ，否则为 。

span.span: An representing the underlying list if it was found; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该数据成员是`null`或空字符串 ("")，则方法返回`dataSource`。If the data member is `null` or an empty string (""), the method returns `dataSource`. 如果`dataSource`不是列表中，返回的值`dataSource`符合属性`dataMember`值。If `dataSource` is not a list, returns the value of the `dataSource` property that matches the `dataMember` value. 如果`dataSource`在于它实现所显示列表，或接口，然后通过从列表中选择项并查询由名为的属性的值该项获取基础列表`dataMember`。If `dataSource` is a list, in that it implements either the or interfaces, then the underlying list is obtained by choosing an item from the list and querying that item for the value of the property named by `dataMember`.

exception.span: 指定的数据成员名称与找到的任何数据源属性都不匹配。

span.span: The specified data member name did not match any of the properties found for the data source.

summary.span: 返回 ，它描述列表中包含的项的属性或列表自身的属性。

span.span: Returns a that describes the properties of the items contained in the list or the list itself.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于检查数据源属性的集合。The method is used to examine the collection of properties for a data source. 此方法的操作取决于的实际类型`list`根据下表的参数：The action of this method depends on the actual type of the `list` parameter according to the following table: |参数类型Parameter type|操作Action| |--------------------|------------| |类型的列表或项的集合。A type that is a list or collection of items.|返回描述列表中包含的项类型的属性。Returns a describing the properties of the item type contained in the list.| |不是列表或集合类型。A type that is not a list or collection.|返回描述类型的属性。Returns a describing the properties of the type.| |`null`|返回一个空 。Returns an empty .|

remarks.format: ## Remarks `dataMember`参数可以为`null`，在这种情况下方法将返回使用数据源的属性说明和数组。The `dataMember` parameter can be `null`, in which case the method will return property descriptions using the data source and the array. 数据成员具有是项的集合的属性，并且你需要知道的集合中的项类型的属性不是集合类型的属性时非常有用。 is useful when the data member has properties that are a collection of items and you need to know properties of the item type in the collection, not the properties of the collection type.

returns.span: 对于复杂的数据绑定，为由数据源中的 表示的项的 ；否则为列表自身的项的 。

span.span: For complex data binding, the of the items represented by the in the data source; otherwise, the of the item in the list itself.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此版本的方法用于确定在复杂或简单数据绑定方案中使用的项的类型。This version of the method is used to determine the type of items used in complex or simple data-binding schemes. 此静态方法可能用于确定尝试它之前是否适合建议的数据绑定方案。This static method may be useful in determining whether a proposed data-binding scheme is appropriate before attempting it. 如果`dataSource`是`null`、 找不到指定的数据成员的列表项的属性说明符或列表项的属性描述符是，则此方法返回的一种类。If `dataSource` is `null`, the property descriptors cannot be found for the list items of the specified data member, or the property descriptor for the list item is an , then this method returns the type of the class. 如果`dataMember`是`null`或为空，则此方法将返回的数据源中的项，如果它是一个列表; 否则，此方法返回的数据源本身。If `dataMember` is `null` or empty, then this method returns the of the items in the data source, if it is a list; otherwise, this method returns the of the data source itself.
